resume_snippet: SUMMARY: An experienced professional with a background in both academia and industry, specializing in R&D, GCP, and GMP. Daniela brings extensive knowledge in drug development, batch release, QMS setup, and conducting inspections and audits. She actively supports Sponsors, trial sites, and CROs by enhancing their quality standards through customized GCP & GMP training, QMS gap analysis, QMS updates, and performing comprehensive GCP and GMP audits. CORE COMPETENCIES: Regulatory Knowledge (GCP/GMP
